rukus.text: 83|1|jeoul-eul sog-ineun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulgeos-ila
83|2|geudeul-eun salamdeullobuteo bad-eul ttaejeoul-eul neomchige hayeo bad-euna
83|3|geudeul-i salamdeul-ege jul ttaeneun mugeleul najchueoseo junola
83|4|geudeul-eun geudeul-i buhwaldoelila saeng gagji anhneunyo
83|5|geunal-eun widaehan nallo
83|6|modeun ingan-i man-yuui junim-ap-e seoneun nal-imyeo
83|7|saaghan jadeul-ui gilog-eun ssijin e bogwandoeeo issnola
83|8|ssijin-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudae ege allyeojuliyo
83|9|geugos-e gilogdoen gilogbuga issno la
83|10|geunal-eneun bulsinhan geudeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-iyo
83|11|simpan-ui nal-eul bujeonghaneun jadeul egedo jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
83|12|eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul bujeongha ji anihana omanhan jadeul-eun yeong-yeog eul beos-eonan joeindeul-ila
83|13|hananim-ui malsseum-i geuege nang songdoel ttae igeos-eun yes seonjodeul-ui uhwa yo lago malhadeola
83|14|geuleohji anhnola geudeul-ui ma-eum deul-i joeag-eulo muldeul-eo issnola
83|15|sillo geunal geudeul-eun beillo galiwojyeo balabojido moshamyeo
83|16|geudeul-eun buljiog-eulo deul-eogagedoeni
83|17|igeos-eun neohuiga geojis-ila geo yeoghaessdeon hyeonsil-ilaneun malsseum-i iss-eul geos-ila
83|18|geuleona uiloun jadeul-ui gilog eun illin-e bogwandoenani
83|19|illin-i mueos-ingaleul mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
83|20|geugos-e gilogdoen gilogbuga iss nola
83|21|hananim gakkaie issneun geudeul i geugeos-eul jeung-eonhal geos-ini
83|22|uiloun jadeul-eun chugbogsog-e iss ge doel geos-imyeo
83|23|geudeul-eun anlag uija-eseo bala bol geos-ila
83|24|neohuineun geudeul-ui eolgul-eseo balg eun chugbog-ui bich-eul insighal geos-imyeo
83|25|bong-indoen sunsuhan sullosseo geudeul ui galjeung-eul sighil geos-imyeo
83|26|choehuui eumlyosuneun miseukeuga doel geos-ini geugeos-eul somanghaneun ja gajge halila
83|27|geogie tasseunim-i honhabdoeeo jini
83|28|geugeos-eun hananim gakkaie iss neun jadeul-i masineun saemmul-ila
83|29|joeindeul-eun min-eum-eul gajyeossdeon ja deul-eul bius-eo
83|30|geudeul yeop-eul jinagal ttaemyeon nunjis-eulo jolonghagon hayeossgo
83|31|geudeul-i muliegelo dol-awass-eulttaeneun umul daessnola
83|32|midneunjaleul bol ttaemyeon bola ideul-i banghwanghan jadeul-ila hadeola
83|33|geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun midneunjaleulgamsihagi wihae bonaeeojin jaga a nimae
83|34|oneul-eun mid-eum-eul gajin jadeul-i geu bulsinjadeul-eul jolonghalila
83|35|ideul-eun anlag-uija-e anj-a ba lada bolila
83|36|bulsinjadeul-eun geudeul-i haenghayeossdeondaelo bosang-eul doedollyeo badji anhneunyo
